migrationsTable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migrations (id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,migration TEXT NOT NULL,createdAt TEXT NOT NULL,updatedAt TEXT DEFAULT NULL,executed INTEGER DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL);
